roleset.name: reduce a cellular response to a molecular stimulus
roleset.note: DOWNREGULATE-V NOTES: Created for Bio-AMR annotations.

role.descr: thing downregulated (e.g. protein or another molecule)

example.name: downregulate-v: example with instrument
example.text: The two-handed E box binding zinc finger protein SIP1 downregulates E-cadherin and induces invasion.
example.arg: The two-handed E box binding zinc finger protein SIP1

example.name: downregulate-v: with intentional agent
example.text: In this study, we downregulated miR-34s in human mesothelial cells to investigate the cellular effect of miR-34 knockdown.
example.arg: to investigate the cellular effect of miR-34 knockdown

example.name: downregulation-n
example.text: Some receptor agonists may cause downregulation of their respective receptor(s),
